document_title: Allergic sinusitis: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_content:
The cause of allergic rhinosinusitis is mainly due to allergens in the living environment.
According to MSc.BSc.CKI Ho Van Huu, factors causing nasal allergies and sinusitis may include:
Change Weather;; Pollen;; Animal hair or their feces;; Fine dust indoors or outdoors;; Air pollution;; Cosmetics, most commonly soap and shampoo;; Mold.
